title: BTSniper
author: BTSniper
content: hello, I am in need of a 30 day btc loan, so i can double my capital balance, load needed is $800 and ill be able to repay back $900 after 30 days after the loan has been received. If any more info is needed, contact me in PM.Thanks

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: What type of collateral do you have to offer?

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: BTSniper on June 25, 2022, 05:55:14 PMhello, I am in need of a 30 day btc loan~Before opening a topic like this, I suggest you first read the sticky topics at the top of the Lending board. You can start with: [EDU] The Rule of "No Collateral, No Loan" - IGNORE AT YOUR OWN RISK!

comments.author: BTSniper
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on June 25, 2022, 08:33:58 PMWhat type of collateral do you have to offer?a vehicle

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: BTSniper on June 26, 2022, 05:37:05 AMQuote from: alterra57 on June 25, 2022, 08:33:58 PMWhat type of collateral do you have to offer?a vehicle That's not collateral for a loan you're taking through a forum. If you have enough Bitcoin that you can use as collateral I will give you the loan.

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on June 26, 2022, 09:10:03 AMThat's not collateral for a loan you're taking through a forum. If you have enough Bitcoin that you can use as collateral I will give you the loan.What collateral is valid? Is 100 US Terra ok?

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on June 26, 2022, 02:28:49 PM~Stop derailing other people's loan request threads with your own request.  It's rude, not to mention off-topic.  If you don't stop I'll start reporting your posts.If you want to request a loan, post your own thread or post in the lenders' threads.  alterra27 has his own loan thread where you can make a request.BTW, the collateral you're offering is only worth $1.  It may get you a loan of about $0.83.

comments.author: BTSniper
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on June 26, 2022, 09:10:03 AMQuote from: BTSniper on June 26, 2022, 05:37:05 AMQuote from: alterra57 on June 25, 2022, 08:33:58 PMWhat type of collateral do you have to offer?a vehicle That's not collateral for a loan you're taking through a forum. If you have enough Bitcoin that you can use as collateral I will give you the loan.unfortunately i dont... what other digital goods/services would you take as collateral ?

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: BTSniper on June 26, 2022, 06:53:02 PMQuote from: alterra57 on June 26, 2022, 09:10:03 AMQuote from: BTSniper on June 26, 2022, 05:37:05 AMQuote from: alterra57 on June 25, 2022, 08:33:58 PMWhat type of collateral do you have to offer?a vehicle That's not collateral for a loan you're taking through a forum. If you have enough Bitcoin that you can use as collateral I will give you the loan.unfortunately i dont... what other digital goods/services would you take as collateral ? I'm only taking crypto as collateral, you can visit my thread here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5403092.0Because your account is brand new I can't give a no collateral loan and I'm sure nobody else will be able to fulfill your request, unless crypto collateral is offered,

comments.author: Quickseller
comments.body: Quote from: BTSniper on July 03, 2022, 04:50:35 AMQuote from: alterra57 on June 26, 2022, 08:04:23 PMQuote from: BTSniper on June 26, 2022, 06:53:02 PMQuote from: alterra57 on June 26, 2022, 09:10:03 AMQuote from: BTSniper on June 26, 2022, 05:37:05 AMQuote from: alterra57 on June 25, 2022, 08:33:58 PMWhat type of collateral do you have to offer?a vehicle That's not collateral for a loan you're taking through a forum. If you have enough Bitcoin that you can use as collateral I will give you the loan.unfortunately i dont... what other digital goods/services would you take as collateral ? I'm only taking crypto as collateral, you can visit my thread here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5403092.0Because your account is brand new I can't give a no collateral loan and I'm sure nobody else will be able to fulfill your request, unless crypto collateral is offered,i was able to get $100 btc for collateral would that be ok for you ?What exactly makes you think that $100 is sufficient collateral for a $800 loan? Especially considering that it will not be possible for basically all lenders to verify your identity.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: BTSniper on July 03, 2022, 04:50:35 AMQuote from: alterra57 on June 26, 2022, 08:04:23 PMQuote from: BTSniper on June 26, 2022, 06:53:02 PMQuote from: alterra57 on June 26, 2022, 09:10:03 AMQuote from: BTSniper on June 26, 2022, 05:37:05 AMQuote from: alterra57 on June 25, 2022, 08:33:58 PMWhat type of collateral do you have to offer?a vehicle That's not collateral for a loan you're taking through a forum. I'm only taking crypto as collateral, you can visit my thread here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5403092.0Because your account is brand new I can't give a no collateral loan and I'm sure nobody else will be able to fulfill your request, unless crypto collateral is offered,i was able to get $100 btc for collateral would that be ok for you ?I'm afraid it won't, Quickseller pretty much explained why. If you visit my post you can see that for a 800 USD loan I would need 960 in collateral.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Am I reading this correctly?The OP is asking for a loan in bitcoin and then later is offering bitcoin as collateral?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: BTSniper on July 03, 2022, 04:50:35 AMi was able to get $100 btc for collateral would that be ok for you ?$100 BTC collateral for $800 BTC loan?  It's the same as asking for $700 no collateral loan.If you can just sell off the car or borrow money from friends you know with that vehicle as collateral. Nobody is going to give you a no collateral loan here, especially for a new account.
